statements.select:
SELECT AA.ID , AA.REG_NO , AA.CORP_NO , AA.NAME , AA.REP_NAME , AA.BIZ_TYPE , AA.BIZ_ITEM , AA.REMARKS , AA.USE_YN , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
, AA.ADDRESS_ID , AD.POST_NO , AD.ZONE_NO , AD.ADDRESS1 , AD.ADDRESS2
FROM jwm.Business AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN jwm.Address AD WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ADDRESS_ID = AD.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID WHERE 1=1
AND AA.REG_NO LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
AND AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY AA.NAME
SELECT ID FROM jwm.Business WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE REG_NO = #REG_NO#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwm.Business ( REG_NO, CORP_NO, NAME, REP_NAME, BIZ_TYPE, BIZ_ITEM, REMARKS, USE_YN, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #REG_NO#, #CORP_NO#, #NAME#, #REP_NAME#, #BIZ_TYPE#, #BIZ_ITEM#, #REMARKS#, #USE_YN#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwm.Business SET NAME = #NAME# , REG_NO = #REG_NO# , CORP_NO = #CORP_NO# , REP_NAME = #REP_NAME# , BIZ_TYPE = #BIZ_TYPE# , BIZ_ITEM = #BIZ_ITEM# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , ADDRESS_ID = #ADDRESS_ID# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
